duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead day-to-day management of current clients' insurance programs and sales opportunities.
Prepare for and lead open enrollment meetings. Review and support in enrollment, benchmarking, financial and utilization data.
Own all audit, review and claims processes for assigned book of business. Analyze data to draft client service plans, stewardship reports, and other meaningful reports.
Develop and maintain strong personal relationships with appropriate insurance carrier personnel.
Mentor or formally direct the work of junior team members. Facilitate and collaborate with account team on the agency’s renewal strategy.
Provide clients with tailored EB programs, review methods of handling risks, identify and explain gaps in the program.

education_certification.credential: 6+ years of related experience and/or training preferred, Current Life and Health license required; professional designations preferred, Bachelor's degree in a related field (Master's preferred)
